Launch of the Web Science Trust Network in IIT Madras

  • Venue : Conference Room, Second Floor, ICSR, IIT Madras
  • Time : 14:00
  • Date : 25th April (Wednesday)

Agenda

  1. Time Details
  2. 14:00 Welcome by Prof. B. Ravindran, Head Robert Bosch Centre for Data Science and AI, IIT Madras
  3. 14:05 An introduction to WSTNet by Prof. Steffen Staab, Coordinator. Web Science Trust
  4. 14:15 Address by Dame Wendy Hall, Executive Director and Co-founder Web Science Trust
  5. 14:25 Summary of Natural Language Processing/Generation work. Dr. Mitesh Khapra, RBCDSAI
  6. 14:40 Summary of Network Science work. Prof. B. Ravindran, RBCDSAI
  7. 14:55 Address by Prof. Noshir Contractor, DAA of IIT Madras, and Director Web Science Trust
  8. 15:10 Address by Prof. R. Nagarajan, Dean International and Alumni Relations
  9. 15:15 Inaugurating Web Science activities @RBC-DSAI webpage
